transcript: It was right in the middle of five different people. I had a huge fat lady to the next of me a crying kid on my left Oh, I like can you please get a bloody Mary please? What even bring me a bloody Mary?

segments.text: It was right in the middle of five different people. I had a huge fat lady to the next of me a crying kid on my left
Oh, I like can you please get a bloody Mary please? What even bring me a bloody Mary?

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: It was right in the middle of five different people.  I had a huge fat lady next me, a crying kid on left I went like can I please get a Bloody Mary, please? Will you bring a Bloody Mary?
